website_summaries.verdict: Professional-grade rotary polisher with everything you need to get started.
pros: Polisher includes a wire mesh screen to prevent wool bonnet fibers from getting in the motor

customer_reviews.title: I thought the rubber covered handles were a cute waste of effort on Makita's part
customer_reviews.text: Buffed and polished my 2003 SAAB in less than 3 hours. Unbelievably brand new looking. Removed all the scratches, swirls and water marks. I thought the rubber covered handles were a cute waste of effort on Makita's part. I was pleasantly surprised. After 2-3 hours, you really are able to feel the difference. As far as the performance, you can tell it is a Makita. They have not compromised their reputation yet. Still a wonderful product. The pads that come with it are all you need to do a complete job. Several complete jobs. No need in buying one the extra pad kits.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Fine Compounding Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is the Cadillac of variable speed compounding buffers! It is very well made and holds a consistent RPM -- what more can you ask from this tool? I'm getting older, and holding the machine at chest level for minutes on end is a workout, but perhaps you younger folks are in better shape.

product_meta.title: Makita 9237CX3 Makita 7" Polisher, 10 AMP, 600-3,000 RPM, var. spd., loop handle with foam pad and bag, ,
product_meta.description: Style:Polisher-Sander KitAutomotive detailers, marine enthusiasts and stone polishers rely on Makita polishers for high-quality detailing and polishing. The 7" Polisher (model 9237C) combines consistent power and speed control with new durability and performance features. The result is a fast and powerful polisher for clear coat finishes, stone polishing, and more. Detailers will appreciate the variable speed dial and trigger so they can match the speed to the application, and the constant speed control is engineered to maintain consistent speed even under load. The 9237C has a rubberized loop handle that provides added comfort for users and added protection for delicate work surfaces. For increased durability, the Polisher has a wire mesh intake cover to prevent wool bonnet fibers and other debris from entering the motor. Overall Length 18.5 inches
